text: “The difference between the stupidities cherished by the Idiocracy set drinking fish cleaner, and the ones pushed in the Atlantic, is that expert class jackasses compound their wrongness by being so sure of themselves that they force others to go along.” https://t.co/KFA8jC6XiY
